sentences.sentence: Other partygoers rescued the injured man from his assailant.
sentences.translation: 其他参加聚会的人从攻击者手中救出了这名受伤的男子。

sentences.sentence: She may have put up a fight to try to ward off her assailant.
sentences.translation: 她可能进行过一场搏斗，试图击退袭击者。

sentences.sentence: Jack fires back at the assailant.
